ValidationRule.description: C16 - if Electronic Only = True, then the Binder Quantity, Inserts Quantity or Spanish Binder Quantity fields can NOT be populated by HRGs.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type"), (Electronic_Only__c), ( (NOT(Binder_Quantity__c = 0)) || (NOT(ISNULL(Binder_Quantity__c))) || (NOT(Inserts_Quantity__c = 0)) || (NOT(ISNULL(Inserts_Quantity__c))) || (NOT(ISNULL(Spanish_Binder_Quantity__c))) ), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You CANNOT select a Binder Quantity, Inserts Quantity or a Spanish Binder Quantity value when checking the Electronic Only field.
